mapper.select: SELECT X.SEAT_ID, X.SEAT_TOP, X.SEAT_LEFT, X.SEAT_NAME , X.SEAT_GUBUN, X.STATE_INFO, X.SEAT_CONFIRMGUBUN,X.RES_REQDAY FROM ( SELECT CASE WHEN (X1.CNT = X1.RESCNT) THEN 'Y' ELSE'N' END STATE_INFO, X1.SEAT_ID, X1.SEAT_TOP, X1.SEAT_LEFT, X1.SEAT_NAME , X1.SEAT_GUBUN, X1.SEAT_CONFIRMGUBUN, X1.RES_REQDAY FROM (SELECT SUM(S.CNT) CNT, S.SEAT_ID, S.SEAT_TOP, S.SEAT_LEFT, S.SEAT_NAME, S.SEAT_GUBUN, S.SEAT_CONFIRMGUBUN, S.RESCNT, S.RES_REQDAY FROM ( SELECT CASE when a.RES_SEQ = 0 THEN ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) ELSE 0 END CNT, b.SEAT_ID, b.SEAT_TOP, b.SEAT_LEFT, b.SEAT_NAME, b.SEAT_GUBUN, a.RES_SEQ, (SELECT dbo.FN_RESCUNT(#{params.resStarttime}, #{params.resEndtime}))RESCNT, b.SEAT_CONFIRMGUBUN, ISNULL(b.RES_REQDAY, 0) RES_REQDAY FROM TB_SWCTIME a, TB_SEATINFO b WHERE a.ITEM_ID = b.SEAT_ID AND SWC_RESDAY = #{params.swcResday} AND a.SWC_TIME BETWEEN #{params.resStarttime} AND #{params.resEndtime} AND FLOOR_SEQ = #{params.floorSeq} AND SWC_RESDAY NOT IN (SELECT HOLY_DAY FROM TB_HOLYINFO WHERE HOLY_DAY = SWC_RESDAY) GROUP by b.SEAT_ID, b.SEAT_TOP, b.SEAT_LEFT, b.SEAT_NAME, b.SEAT_GUBUN, b.SEAT_CONFIRMGUBUN, a.RES_SEQ, b.RES_REQDAY )S GROUP BY S.SEAT_ID, S.SEAT_TOP, S.SEAT_LEFT, S.SEAT_NAME, S.SEAT_GUBUN, S.SEAT_CONFIRMGUBUN, S.RESCNT, S.RES_REQDAY ) X1 UNION ALL SELECT CASE WHEN CONVERT(VARCHAR(8), GETDATE() , 112) = #{params.swcResday} THEN CASE WHEN ( SELECT RES_SEQ FROM TB_SWCRESERVATION c WHERE ITEM_ID = a.SEAT_ID AND c.RES_STARTDAY = #{params.swcResday}) > 0 THEN CASE WHEN ( SELECT TOP 1 c.OT_TIME FROM TB_SWCRESERVATION c WHERE ITEM_ID = a.SEAT_ID AND c.RES_STARTDAY = #{params.swcResday} AND IN_TIME is not null ORDER BY RES_SEQ DESC ) IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END ELSE 'Y' END ELSE 'N' END STATE_INFO, a.SEAT_ID, a.SEAT_TOP, a.SEAT_LEFT, a.SEAT_NAME, a.SEAT_GUBUN, a.SEAT_CONFIRMGUBUN, 0 as RES_REQDAY FROM TB_SEATINFO a WHERE SEAT_GUBUN = 'SEAT_GUBUN_1' AND FLOOR_SEQ = #{params.floorSeq} ) X ORDER BY X.SEAT_NAME ASC

SELECT d.DATES as SWC_RESDAY, CASE x.RES_POSSIBLE WHEN 'O' THEN 'S' WHEN 'F' THEN 'D' ELSE 'W' END AS RES_POSSIBLE, x.SWC_SEQ, x.SEAT_NAME, x.HOL_DT_YN FROM tb_calender d LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT CASE when (SELECT ifnull(count(RES_SEQ),0) FROM tb_swctime e WHERE a.SWC_RESDAY = e.SWC_RESDAY and e.SWC_SEQ = a.SWC_SEQ AND (e.RES_SEQ = 0) ) > 17 THEN 'O' ELSE 'F' END AS RES_POSSIBLE, count(TIME_SEQ)as count , a.SWC_SEQ, b.SEAT_NAME, a.SWC_RESDAY, e.HOL_DT_YN FROM TB_SWCTIME a, TB_SWC_ROOM b , TB_CENTERINFO c, TB_HOLY e WHERE a.SWC_SEQ = b.SWC_SEQ AND b.CENTER_ID = c.CENTER_ID AND b.CENTER_ID = #{centerId} AND b.SWC_SEQ = #{swcSeq} AND a.SWC_RESDAY BETWEEN #{timeStartDay} AND #{timeEndDay} AND e.DT = a.SWC_RESDAY GROUP BY a.SWC_SEQ, b.SEAT_NAME, a.SWC_RESDAY, e.HOL_DT_YN ) x ON d.DATES = x.SWC_RESDAY WHERE d.DATES BETWEEN #{timeStartDay} AND #{timeEndDay} ORDER BY d.DATES asc, x.SEAT_NAME ASC

SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) AS CNT FROM TB_SWCRESERVATION WHERE RES_STARTDAY = #{params.timeStartDay} AND RES_STARTTIME BETWEEN #{params.strTime} AND dbo.FN_UPSTIMEDOWN(#{params.endTime}) AND RES_ENDTIME BETWEEN #{params.strTime} AND dbo.FN_UPSTIMEDOWN(#{params.endTime} ) AND USER_ID = #{params.userId} AND ITEM_GUBUN = 'ITEM_GUBUN_2' AND RESERV_PROCESS_GUBUN in ('PROCESS_GUBUN_1', 'PROCESS_GUBUN_2', 'PROCESS_GUBUN_4')

SELECT SUM(X.CNT) as CNT FROM ( SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) as CNT FROM TB_SWCTIME WHERE SWC_RESDAY = #{params.timeStartDay} AND ITEM_ID = #{params.meetingId} AND swc_time BETWEEN #{params.strTime} AND '1830' AND RES_SEQ != 0 AND USE_YN = 'N' and APPRIVAL in ('R','Y','E') UNION ALL SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) as CNT FROM TB_SWCTIME WHERE SWC_RESDAY BETWEEN Convert(varchar(8), dateadd(dd, 1 , Convert(datetime, #{params.timeStartDay})), 112) AND Convert(varchar(8), dateadd(dd, -1 , Convert(datetime, #{params.timeEndDay} )), 112) AND ITEM_ID = #{params.meetingId} AND swc_time BETWEEN '0800' AND '1830' AND RES_SEQ != 0 AND USE_YN = 'N' and APPRIVAL in ('R','Y','E') UNION ALL SELECT ISNULL(COUNT(*),0) as CNT FROM TB_SWCTIME WHERE SWC_RESDAY = #{params.timeEndDay} AND ITEM_ID =#{params.meetingId} AND swc_time BETWEEN '0800' AND #{params.endTime} AND RES_SEQ != 0 AND USE_YN = 'N' and APPRIVAL in ('R','Y','E') )X
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_swctime SET APPRIVAL =#{apprival} WHERE RES_SEQ = #{resSeq}
UPDATE tb_swctime SET RES_SEQ = 0, APPRIVAL =#{apprival} WHERE RES_SEQ = #{resSeq}
